dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5260 IH: Pay Our Border Patrol and Customs Agents Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. De La Cruz (for herself, Ms. Tenney, Mr. Patronis, Mr. Van Orden, Mr. Fry, and Mrs. Hinson) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Appropriations

form.official-title: Making appropriations for the salaries and expenses of certain U.S. Customs and Border Protection employees working during a Government shutdown in fiscal year 2026, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Pay Our Border Patrol and Customs Agents Act.

section.header: Payment of salaries of certain CBP employees working during a Government shutdown
section.text: There are appropriated for fiscal year 2026, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated, such sums as are necessary to pay, during any period of a lapse in discretionary appropriations during such fiscal year beginning on or after the date of the enactment of this section, the salaries and expenses of any Agents of the U.S. Border Patrol and officers of the Office of Field Operations within U.S. Customs and Border Protection excepted from furlough during such lapse.
